NK003(ga)010:0: gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs dang 'brel bar
NK003(ga)010:1: s+aats+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'i lag len dri med kun
NK003(ga)010:2: snang zhes bya ba bzhugs so ////
NK003(ga)010:4: gang gsung bdud rtsi'i zegs ma phra rab kyang //
NK003(ga)010:5: 'jig rten bcud mchog kun gyis mi bskrun pa //
NK003(ga)010:6: thub gsung snying gi ze'u 'brur chags pa yis //
NK003(ga)010:7: blo dman dad pa can gyi dbyig 'di sbyin //
NK003(ga)010:8: gtsug gtor dri med kyi gzungs las mchod rten brgya
NK003(ga)010:9: rtsa brgyad dang lnga gdab pa'i cho ga gnyis su
NK003(ga)010:10: gsungs shing / 'bum phrag btab pa'i phan yon bstan
NK003(ga)010:11: pa'i shugs las stong rtsa sogs gdab pa'i cho ga'ang
NK003(ga)010:13: de'i don gsal shes grub tu bargya'am stong sogs dkyil
NK003(ga)010:14: 'khor gcig tu btab pa'i tshul rgyas par bshad la
NK003(ga)010:15: / gang ltar s+aats+tsha brgya brgyad la gzungs ring thung
NK003(ga)010:16: dang skor ba brgya rtsa 'gro ba'i cho ga sbyor
NK003(ga)010:17: dngos rjes tshang tshar re 'gro dgos pa gzhung gi
NK003(ga)010:18: dgongs pa dang bla ma rnams kyi phyag len yin
NK003(ga)010:19: / pas / 'byor pa che na cho ga tshar
NK003(ga)010:20: re la s+aats+tsha brgya brgyad dang mchod pa de mtshungs
NK003(ga)010:21: bshams pa'i tshar stong phrag gcig gis mchod rten 'bum
NK003(ga)010:22: 'grub pa byas na phan yon tshad med cing /
NK003(ga)010:23: de ltar gyi tshe cho ga mkhan po dge slong
NK003(ga)010:24: bzhi sde tsam dang gzungs dang skor ba'i grangs spyi
NK003(ga)010:25: 'go nas 'gro bar byas na 'tshams par 'gyur ba
NK003(ga)010:26: dang / 'byor pa chung bas de ltar mi lcogs
NK003(ga)010:27: na s+aats+tsha stong phrag re dang brgya mchod sogs bshams
NK003(ga)010:28: te dge slong bcu tham pas cho ga btang nas
NK003(ga)010:29: tshar grangs brgya phrag gis 'bum ther 'grub par 'gyur
NK003(ga)010:30: dang / la / de ltar gyi tshe cho ga
NK003(ga)010:31: re la gzungs dang skor ba'i mi res brgya rtsa
NK003(ga)010:32: re 'grub dka' bas lan bcu gcig re byas na
NK003(ga)010:33: spyi nas brgya dang bcu 'gro bas des kyang rung
NK003(ga)010:34: dang / la / zhing / bar rnams ni de yis rigs 'gres pas chog go //
NK003(ga)010:35: shin tu 'byor pa dman pas cho ga tshar grangs
NK003(ga)010:36: mang po mi 'grub la s+aats+tsha grangs mang gdab par
NK003(ga)010:37: 'dod na / gzhi yangs por pad+ma'i gdan mang por s+aats+tsha gang shong bsgrig /
NK003(ga)010:38: mchod pa yang ci 'byor bshams nas dge slong grangs ka gang 'dzom gyis cho ga btang /
NK003(ga)010:39: de ltar nyin gcig gam gsum sogs la cho ga
NK003(ga)010:40: gang thon gyis s+aats+tsha rdzogs par byas na cho ga
NK003(ga)010:41: ma byas pa las ni phan yon 'gyur khyad shin
NK003(ga)010:42: tu che zhing / 'byor pas ma lcogs pa la nyes pa'ang med do //
NK003(ga)010:43: tshar grangs mang nyung gang byed kyang bsham bkod sogs
NK003(ga)010:44: ni 'og tu gsal ba'i rgyas bsdus gang 'grub ma
NK003(ga)010:46: de ltar spyir rgyas bsdus byed tshul gyi rnam dbye pyed par byas nas /
NK003(ga)010:47: bye brag lag len dngos bshad pa la bzhi /
NK003(ga)010:50: cho ga rgyas bsdus btang tshul /
NK003(ga)010:51: rjes ji ltar bzhugs pa'i tshul bshad pa'o //
NK003(ga)010:53: s+aats+tsha'i rgyu 'jim pa'i sa gang nas len pa'i gnas der /
NK003(ga)010:54: dkar gtor dang gser skyems bsham /
NK003(ga)010:55: rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal gyis byin
NK003(ga)010:56: gyis brlabs la 'bul tshig rgyas bsdus ci 'grub bya
NK003(ga)010:57: / tshon skud lnga bsgril gyi skud pas sa ji
NK003(ga)010:58: tsam len dgos pa'i rgya khyon gyi mthar gru bzhir
NK003(ga)010:59: / bcad la / badz+ra s+au tra h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:61: sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa
NK003(ga)010:62: mchod rten dang dge ba'i las la bar du gcod
NK003(ga)010:63: pa rnams rdo rje'i ra bas mtshams bcad /
NK003(ga)010:64: gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur /
NK003(ga)010:65: seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa lnga dbus dang thig gi grwa bzhir gdab /
NK003(ga)010:66: gcig las ma 'byor na 'debs pa'i tshul byas la mthar dbus su gdab ste /
NK003(ga)010:67: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba dush+t+aana h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:69: sa ji tsam dgos pa blangs ma zin gyi bar thig dang phur bu mi bsdu'o //
NK003(ga)010:70: de nas til dang yungs kar la /
NK003(ga)010:71: a mri te ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:73: bgegs thams cad tshar bcad de sa'i phyogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par gyur /
NK003(ga)010:75: gzungs thung yang brjod la byin gyis brlab bo //
NK003(ga)010:77: badz+ra kha na kha na h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:79: sa gzhi rin chen rnam lnga brkos pa yis //
NK003(ga)010:80: de bzhin gshegs sku rnam dag rgyur gyur cig /
NK003(ga)010:81: ces brjod la yid kyis kyang dmigs pa gzhan la'ang 'agre'o //
NK003(ga)010:82: sa gtsang ma blang ba gnas gtsang mar spungs la
NK003(ga)010:83: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya bcas tho bas
NK003(ga)010:84: brdung la / badz+ra mung+ga ra +aa ko ta ya +aa ko ta ya h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:86: nyon mongs bag chags byang zhing 'joms gyur cig /
NK003(ga)010:88: chu gtsang dri zhim spos dang sbyar ba la rdo rje'i phyag rgya gtugs te /
NK003(ga)010:89: spos chu'i steng du a las zla dkyil las //
NK003(ga)010:90: 'od 'phros chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyur //
NK003(ga)010:92: lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlabs pas 'jim pa bardzisa la /
NK003(ga)010:93: badz+ra pra mrda n+aa ya h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:95: 'jim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur cig /
NK003(ga)010:96: de nas 'jim pa byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK003(ga)010:97: shud+d+he na du sho d+ha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:98: pad zlar 'jim pa rin chen phung po gyur //
NK003(ga)010:99: rang gi thugs ka'i 'od zer 'og min du //
NK003(ga)010:100: 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad thugs rgyud bskul //
NK003(ga)010:101: de las 'od 'phros 'gro rgyud nyon mongs sbyangs //
NK003(ga)010:102: slar 'dus 'jim pa'i phung po la thim pas //
NK003(ga)010:103: bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes rang bzhin gyur //
NK003(ga)010:104: lag g.yon pa'i mathe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa gyen bstan dang /
NK003(ga)010:105: lag g.yas de bzhin byas pa kha sbubs pa'i bar du 'jim pa bzhag la /
NK003(ga)010:106: na mo b+ha ga wa te bee ro tsa na pra b+ha r+aa dza ya /
NK003(ga)010:116: a sho ba ti ma h+aa te dza /
NK003(ga)010:119: sarba bud+d+ha a d+hish+th+aa na a d+hish+thi te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:120: zhes rnam snang gi gzungs ring lan nyer gcig dang /
NK003(ga)010:126: badz+ra a yu she s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:127: 'chi med rdo rje'i srog zungs thob par shog /
NK003(ga)010:130: 'od zer 'jig rten kun khyab 'gro don byas //
NK003(ga)010:131: slar 'dus 'bi 'bi shel gong ltar dag pa //
NK003(ga)010:132: ye shes rdo rje 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyur //
NK003(ga)010:133: brkos phor du snum byugs la /
NK003(ga)010:134: a ra dze bi ra dze s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:135: thabs shes zung 'jug ye shes rdul bral gyur //
NK003(ga)010:137: badz+ra d+h+aa tu gar+b+he s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:139: d+harma d+h+aa tu gar+b+he s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:140: chos dbyings rtag pa'i snying po rnyed par gyur //
NK003(ga)010:142: badz+ra mung+ga ra +aa ko ta ya +aa ko ta ya h'u phata /
NK003(ga)010:143: sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgyas btab par gyur //
NK003(ga)010:144: gzungs bsgril mgo mjug ma log par gzhug la /
NK003(ga)010:147: zhes dang gzungs thung yang bzla /
NK003(ga)010:148: dbyings ye gnyis med chos sku'i mchod rten ni //
NK003(ga)010:149: 'byams klas ye shes snying po khong chud gyur //
NK003(ga)010:152: chos kyi sku las gzugs sku grangs med byon //
NK003(ga)010:153: 'gro don 'khor ba ji srid mdzad par gyur //
NK003(ga)010:154: skam thag chod nas chos 'khor sogs rgyan btags par mos la /
NK003(ga)010:155: pra ma na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:156: rin chen rgyan bkod sna tshogs gsol ba yis //
NK003(ga)010:157: yon tan kun rdzogs 'gro don mdzad gyur cig /
NK003(ga)010:158: sku dkar sogs na bza' gsol la /
NK003(ga)010:159: d+harma d+h+aa tu swa b+h+aa ba bi shud+d+he d+harma te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:160: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don ldan shog /
NK003(ga)010:161: ces pa'i cho ga rnams kyis btab zin nas gdan la bzhugs pa'i skabs su /
NK003(ga)010:162: su pra tish+tha badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:164: rgyal ba thams cad rten 'di dang //
NK003(ga)010:165: dbyer med brtan par bzhugs su gsol //
NK003(ga)010:166: zhes brjod de ltar s+aats+tsha 'debs pa'i tshe 'byor pa
NK003(ga)010:167: dang bstun pa'i klog mkhan grangs ci rigs khrus sogs
NK003(ga)010:168: gtsang sbra dang ldan pas skyabs sems /
NK003(ga)010:171: bzhugs gsol lha khrus yan lag bdun pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK003(ga)010:172: 'phags pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul ba dang /
NK003(ga)010:173: ris med pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba'i sems bskyed de /
NK003(ga)010:174: brgyad stong la sogs sher phyin gyi mdo /
NK003(ga)010:177: 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa dang /
NK003(ga)010:178: gtsug tor dri med kyi mdo gzungs rnams rgyun mi 'chad par gsal dag tu bklag la /
NK003(ga)010:180: chos bshad pa las byung ba sogs kyis bsngo ba'ang bya /
NK003(ga)010:181: de thams cad ma 'grub na'ang sher snying dang dri med kyi gzungs ring thung /
NK003(ga)010:182: khyad par snying po'i gzungs thung rtag tu bzla /
NK003(ga)010:183: shin tu 'dzom na s+aats+tsha 'debs pa dang sgrub pa'i
NK003(ga)010:184: tshe dzapa rgyun kyang btsugs par gsungs te gal che'o
NK003(ga)010:185: // de dag rnams kyi s+aats+tsha gdab pa'i bya ba 'grub bo //
NK003(ga)010:186: de la nang gzhug dri med kyi gzungs ring thung
NK003(ga)010:187: gnyis ka dgos kyang brgya brgyad tsam la de bzhin
NK003(ga)010:188: 'grub pa ci nas gal che zhing /
NK003(ga)010:189: khri 'bum la de bzhin 'grub dka' bas gzungs thung kho nas chog /
NK003(ga)010:190: gang ltar rgya shog sogs la spar du btab nas
NK003(ga)010:191: dri bzang gis byugs pa'am mtshal snag la bsres kyang
NK003(ga)010:192: rung / shug pa sogs bzang shing mgo mjug ma
NK003(ga)010:193: log pa'i srog shing mtshon byed la gzungs kyi dbu
NK003(ga)010:194: nas sngags ngo nang bstan du dril ba bcug /
NK003(ga)010:195: s+aats+tsha skam thag chod nas zhi ba la dkar po /
NK003(ga)010:196: rgyas pa la ser po sogs las bzhi'i mdog mtshungs
NK003(ga)010:197: kyi kha dog bsgyur bar gsungs kyang dkyus su thams
NK003(ga)010:198: cad sku dkar legs par gsol zhing /
NK003(ga)010:199: gdugs kyi mtshon byed dar tshon sna lnga gang 'dzom
NK003(ga)010:200: gyi dum bu re'ang s+aats+tsha'i dbu la sbyar grub na
NK003(ga)010:201: legs so // s+aats+tsha'ang phal cher gyis mchod brgya ma khri phrag la 'bum ther byed srol snang yang /
NK003(ga)010:202: 'di'i gzhung nas gsungs pa'i 'bum phrag ni gzungs nyid
NK003(ga)010:203: la dgongs pa yin pas nges par gzungs 'bum phrag
NK003(ga)010:204: dang ldan pa'i s+aats+tsha 'bum phrag grub dgos pas mchod
NK003(ga)010:205: brgya ma grangs ldan btab na lag len bde zhing
NK003(ga)010:208: mkhan po'i gzhung du rgyas bsdus kyi khyad par ma gsungs kyang /
NK003(ga)010:209: dri med 'grel pa slob dpon lhan skyes rol pas
NK003(ga)010:210: mdzad pa nyid phal cher gyis tshad mar byed pas
NK003(ga)010:215: dkyil 'khor gang du bya ba'i gzhi der slob dpon gyis dkar gtor gser skyems 'bul zhing /
NK003(ga)010:218: til yungs brabs shing gzungs thung brjod pa yan chad
NK003(ga)010:219: gong du s+aats+tsha 'debs pa'i cho gar bshad pa rnams
NK003(ga)010:220: sngar nyin du grub par bya /
NK003(ga)010:221: dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu sa rdo la brtsigs pa'am shing la bzos kyang rung ste dbyibs gru bzhi /
NK003(ga)010:222: steng me long ltar 'jam zhing mnyam pa /
NK003(ga)010:223: ngos bzhir seng ge brgyad kyis btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri rkang 'bur ram ri mor bris pa /
NK003(ga)010:224: rgya tshad cho ga tshar re la s+aats+tsha grangs gang
NK003(ga)010:225: bzhugs nyid shong bar byed dgos pas s+aats+tsha che chung
NK003(ga)010:226: sogs dang bstun pa'i steng du ba byung lnga dang
NK003(ga)010:227: gur gum tsan+dana sogs dri'i chus chag chag gdab /
NK003(ga)010:228: de nas phyag len gyi gtso bo mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad pa ltar na /
NK003(ga)010:229: gzhal yas khang rta babs med pa'i sgo rkyang gi
NK003(ga)010:230: phyi rol khrus rdzing pad+ma 'od zer gyi khor yug
NK003(ga)010:231: dang bcas pa'i thig tshon spyi ltar la /
NK003(ga)010:232: tshangs thig gi g.yas g.yon bzhi por cha drug rer
NK003(ga)010:233: bgos pa'i re'u mig sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
NK003(ga)010:235: de'i cha lnga pa yan chad rnams su s+aats+tsha brgya rtsa bzhugs pa'i gnas yin cing /
NK003(ga)010:236: cha drug pa'i tshangs thig phyogs bzhi'i g.yas g.yon gyi
NK003(ga)010:237: re'u mig gnyis gnyis la s+aats+tsha re re bzhugs pas
NK003(ga)010:238: brgyad tshang / de'i 'phros 'phags pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i lha snam yin la /
NK003(ga)010:239: shong yangs che na thog ma nas cha bdun rer
NK003(ga)010:240: phyes te lha snam rim pa gnyis su byas na'ang
NK003(ga)010:241: legs so // gal te cho ga gcig la s+aats+tsha
NK003(ga)010:242: stong rtsa bzhugs na phyogs reer cha drug cu rer
NK003(ga)010:245: de ltar dkyil 'khor yang s+aats+tsha blang bzhag gi tshe
NK003(ga)010:246: mi zub pa bya dgos pas shing stegs yin na
NK003(ga)010:247: chu tshon gyis bris nas rtsi btang ba sogs shes
NK003(ga)010:248: par bya / de nas re'u mig gi pad+ma re la s+aats+tsha re bzhag ste /
NK003(ga)010:250: de nas shar lho nub byang rim bzhin g.yas bskor du dgod /
NK003(ga)010:251: dbus su 'phrul stegs la lugs ma la sogs pa'i
NK003(ga)010:252: mchod rten la sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang ldan
NK003(ga)010:253: pa bzhugs / steng du gdugs dang bla bre /
NK003(ga)010:255: khyad par ba dan dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad logs rer nyer bdun re bkod legs mdzes par bkram /
NK003(ga)010:256: de dag gi dbus kyi char 'ja' 'od lnga ldan
NK003(ga)010:257: gyi nang du thig le sngon po la gtsug tor
NK003(ga)010:258: dri med kyi gzungs ring thung gser gyis bris pa
NK003(ga)010:259: dang / phyogs bzhir mchod rten dkar ser dmar ljang bzhi'i bum sgor gzungs thung /
NK003(ga)010:260: gdugs la gzungs ring bris pa'i thang ka'ang bsham /
NK003(ga)010:261: sku gdung rnams kyi phyi rol ngos bzhir bum pa
NK003(ga)010:262: rgyan ldan bzhi'i nang 'bru lnga sman lnga rin po
NK003(ga)010:263: che lnga dang dri chab blugs pa'i khar /
NK003(ga)010:264: snod gtsang mar bye ma barngosa nas dug phyung pa yungs kar dang bsres pa bzhag /
NK003(ga)010:265: dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir spos phor bzhi bzhag ste
NK003(ga)010:266: tsan+dana dang a ga ru dang du rush+ka dang gu
NK003(ga)010:267: gul bzhi po rgyun ma chad par bdug /
NK003(ga)010:268: du rush+ka dngos ma rnyed na spos dkar gyis rung /
NK003(ga)010:269: sgo bzhir mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag pa'i nang du /
NK003(ga)010:270: gur gum 'bras yos nas til dkar ku sha 'o
NK003(ga)010:271: ma me tog dkar po ste rdzas bdun cung zad
NK003(ga)010:272: re blugs / mchod yon sgreng ba'i bya ma bum chu gtsang gis bkang ba dang /
NK003(ga)010:273: khrus snod me long sku phyi na bza' /
NK003(ga)010:274: rgyal chen phyogs skyong sde brgyad rnams la zlum gtor gsum rnams kyang stegs bde bar bzhag /
NK003(ga)010:275: me tog mar me zhal zas gtso bor gyur pa'i
NK003(ga)010:276: nyer spyod lnga brgya phrag gi phreng bas mtshon mchod
NK003(ga)010:277: pa'i bye brag rgyas par bsham dgos kyang dkyil 'khor
NK003(ga)010:278: gyi mthar s+aats+tsha len bzhag skabs stabs mi bde bas
NK003(ga)010:279: / bar phye nas phyogs phyogs kyi stegs bur bsgrigs
NK003(ga)010:280: pa rnams kyi dbus su snod gtsang mar ts+aa ru'i
NK003(ga)010:281: bza' ba zlum gtor che legs dkar mngar shing tog
NK003(ga)010:282: gi bza' bca' sna tshogs dang ldan pa sman lnga
NK003(ga)010:283: 'bru lnga dri lnga rin po che lnga snying po
NK003(ga)010:284: lnga ste lnga phrag lnga'i rdzas /
NK003(ga)010:285: bkra shis rdzas rtags 'bur ram ri mor bris pa rnams rten la kha phyogs te bkod /
NK003(ga)010:286: slob dpon gyi mdun du khrus bum mam dung phor dri chab kyis bkang ba /
NK003(ga)010:288: gzhan yang rol mo'i bye brag mdo chog la 'os pa'i rigs kyang 'du bya'o //
NK003(ga)010:290: dkyil 'khor gyi sa chog rnams 'dor len ji ltar byas kyang rung la /
NK003(ga)010:291: dkyil 'khor sgo dang rta babs sogs med pa'i pad+ma'i gdan snam bu dang bcas pa bri /
NK003(ga)010:292: bsham bkod rigs gong ltar la gzungs dang mchod rten bris pa'i thang ka lnga po mi dgos la /
NK003(ga)010:293: brgya mchod rnams gang 'byor byas nas tshar re bzhin kha gso /
NK003(ga)010:294: ts+aa ru'i bza' ba'ang dkyil 'khor mdun du tshar gcig bkod pas chog /
NK003(ga)010:295: bum pa bzhi mi 'dzom na gcig bye snod bcas slob dpon mdun du bzhag /
NK003(ga)010:296: spos phor yang gcig gis mtshon tsam rung zhing bzang
NK003(ga)010:297: spos ma 'dzom na shug pa dang a ga ru
NK003(ga)010:298: dkyus ma si la sogs bdug pas go chod /
NK003(ga)010:299: lnga tshan lnga ma 'byor na ri mor bris pas kyang rung ro //
NK003(ga)010:300: gsum pa cho ga btang tshul la gnyis /
NK003(ga)010:304: bslab pa dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun pa rnams kyis mgo lus la khrus bya zhing bkru /
NK003(ga)010:305: chos gos rnam gsum tshul dang ldan par bgo /
NK003(ga)010:306: khyim pa yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung la khrus dang gos gtsang ma gyon /
NK003(ga)010:307: sha chang sgog btsong ma yin pa'i dkar mngar gyi bza' btung bag yod par longs spyad /
NK003(ga)010:308: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
NK003(ga)010:310: gzhan la gnod 'tshe sogs ma dag pa'i bsal sbyor ci nus su spang /
NK003(ga)010:311: dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan dang mdo sde dang
NK003(ga)010:312: mchod rten gyi phan yon la yid ches pa'i dad
NK003(ga)010:313: pa dang gus pa cher bskyed /
NK003(ga)010:314: sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje'i sems
NK003(ga)010:315: bskyed la cho ga'i tshig dal brel ran cing sngags
NK003(ga)010:316: sgra dag pa sogs gal che /
NK003(ga)010:317: 'grub tu rung na don zhags lugs kyi theg chen
NK003(ga)010:318: gso sbyong blangs la tshul khrims rnam dag gzungs bzla
NK003(ga)010:319: ba nangs re bzhin byas na shin tu legs /
NK003(ga)010:320: 'byor pas lcogs na gong smos mdo sde rnams klog pa po gcig /
NK003(ga)010:321: gzungs zlo ba po gcig bcas bzhag go //
NK003(ga)010:327: dge 'dun rnams gral du 'khod pa dang rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi gzungs brjod /
NK003(ga)010:328: snying po dang khrus bdun rig pa ci 'grub bzlas
NK003(ga)010:329: pas bum pa'i chu byin gyis brlabs te 'dus pa
NK003(ga)010:330: rnams nas khrus dang 'thor 'thung byas mthar phan yon
NK003(ga)010:331: brjod / spro na thub bstod gang rung 'don /
NK003(ga)010:332: 'greng ste sems brtse ma brjod la phyogs bcu'i rgyal
NK003(ga)010:333: ba sras bcas mngon sum lta bur dmigs nas phyag
NK003(ga)010:334: bya / de nas gdan la 'khod de /
NK003(ga)010:336: su pra tish+tha stu be s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)010:338: phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar gyur /
NK003(ga)010:341: tree ya sogs sngags mtshan bzhi /
NK003(ga)010:342: rat+na tseet+ya sogs gong 'og gi sngags thams cad lan gsum gsum dang /
NK003(ga)010:343: bar gyi dmigs pa rnams kyang /
NK003(ga)010:345: ces smon lam du bsgyur ba sogs shes par byas la rten dang yo byad spyir byin gyis brlab /
NK003(ga)010:346: yang na 'di dag kho bos gsar bsgrig dri med lam 'jug ltar byas kyang rung ngo //
NK003(ga)010:350: gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes //
NK003(ga)010:351: de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
NK003(ga)010:352: rkyen las rag las gang de stong pa nyid //
NK003(ga)010:353: gang gis stong nyid shes de bag yod yin //
NK003(ga)010:354: zhes sh+lo ka brjod la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom /
NK003(ga)010:355: de na dri med cho ga gzhung ltar /
NK003(ga)010:356: chos thams cad don dam par sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:358: sems can thams cad bde ba dang sogs tshad med bzhi bsgom /
NK003(ga)010:359: bdag ni dus ngan pa'i sogs kyis sems bskyed la /
NK003(ga)010:360: sa gzhi rten mchod byin rlabs dang /
NK003(ga)010:361: bde stobs brjod pa lan gsum gsum /
NK003(ga)010:364: dge 'dun rnams pus btsug thal sbyar me tog blangs la /
NK003(ga)010:365: bcom ldan 'das dpal sh+aakya thub pa sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:366: byin gyis brlab par ci gnang zhes pa'i tshig gong ma'i bar /
NK003(ga)010:368: de bzhin gshegs pa dang sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:372: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nas /
NK003(ga)010:376: de lta bur gshegs par gsol /
NK003(ga)010:377: ces pa'i bar gyis rgyal ba sras bcas /
NK003(ga)010:378: mchod rten chos skyong ba bcas spyan drangs la bar
NK003(ga)010:379: mtshams rnams su me tog 'thor zhing rol mo'i sgra
NK003(ga)010:383: 'grengs la phyag lan bdun 'tshal bzhin du /
NK003(ga)010:385: ye shes tshogs kyis sogs byon phyag 'bul ba nas /
NK003(ga)010:388: ar+g+ham 'bul ba'i skabs phyogs bzhir mchod yon sbreng /
NK003(ga)010:389: khrus kyi skabs phyogs bzhi'i bum pas phyogs so so nas khrus gsol ba sogs dang /
NK003(ga)010:390: mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul ba'i thog mar mchod sprin gyi sngags lan gsum brjod /
NK003(ga)010:391: yungs kar 'bul ba'i skabs su yungs kar 'thor ba dang rol mo sogs bya /
NK003(ga)010:392: mchod 'bul gong 'og 'khrugs cung zad snang yang lag len mi bde bas btang snyoms su bzhag pa'o //
NK003(ga)010:393: de nas 'grengs la phyag 'tshal ba'i gzungs lan gsum sngon du 'gro bas /
NK003(ga)010:395: bcom ldans 'das mi 'khrugs pa sogs chos dkon mchog la phyag 'tshal ba yan dang /
NK003(ga)010:397: shes rab mchog gis sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:398: rmad rdzogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod bar /
NK003(ga)010:400: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nas phyag 'tshal rdzogs pa'i /
NK003(ga)010:401: skyabs su mchi'o'i bar brjod la phyag bya /
NK003(ga)010:403: 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:405: mchod sprin gyi gzungs sngags bcas rol mo bya /
NK003(ga)010:407: ye shes tshogs rdzogs sogs mthar chags su btang ba las /
NK003(ga)010:408: ar+g+ham gsol ba'i skabs bya ma bum spos kyis bdug /
NK003(ga)010:409: lag thal sbyar gyis dpral bar bzung la phyogs bzhi'i
NK003(ga)010:410: mchod yon gyi snod rnams su g.yas bskor du sbreng
NK003(ga)010:411: / rgyal chen sogs la mchod cing bstod pa ma
NK003(ga)010:412: gtogs gtor 'bul gzhung 'dir ma bshad pas mi dgos
NK003(ga)010:413: kyang spyi ltar spro na 'gal ba med pas /
NK003(ga)010:414: mchod rten bstod pa grub nas 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis bsang /
NK003(ga)010:416: cha gsum ltar thun mong du byin brlab /
NK003(ga)010:418: a k+aa ro btags pa lan gsum gyis 'bul /
NK003(ga)010:419: shar phyogs na ni sogs kyis bstod cing phrin las bcol /
NK003(ga)010:420: in+d+r+aa ya sogs kyis phyogs skyong dang /
NK003(ga)010:422: n+aa ga sogs kyis sde brgyad la 'bul zhing mchod bstod byas la gtor ma gshegs /
NK003(ga)010:424: byang chub bsngo ba'i bar gzhung rdzogs par grub pa dang /
NK003(ga)010:426: 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad dgongs su gsol sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:427: de bzhin du gyur cig bar gzhung las lan gsum gsungs pa rnams kyang de ltar brjod /
NK003(ga)010:428: de nas gtsug tor dri med kyi mdo gzungs dbu'i rgya skad nas bzung tshar gcig bklag /
NK003(ga)010:429: gzungs ring thung la slebs pa dang de dag brgya
NK003(ga)010:430: rtsa re bzla dgos pas gcig gis grangs 'gro dka'
NK003(ga)010:431: na spyi 'gor brtsis kyang rung ngo //
NK003(ga)010:434: phyogs bcu dus gsum sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:435: dbyings la 'god par gyur cig bar brjod /
NK003(ga)010:436: gzungs ring thung brjod cing gzungs bum rnams kyi bum chu bkyes la 'thor 'thung bya /
NK003(ga)010:437: de nas rin chen rgyan mtshan gyi sngags dang 'od
NK003(ga)010:438: zer dri med las 'byung ba'i skor ba'i sngags lan
NK003(ga)010:439: gsum brjod / gzungs ring thung gnyis ka'am mi shes
NK003(ga)010:440: na gzungs thung bzla bzhin du bskor ba lan brgya
NK003(ga)010:441: gsum brjod / rtsa brgyad / de'ang mi lcogs na mi grangs la bartsi'o //
NK003(ga)010:442: de nas gdan la 'khor de mchod rten bskor ba'i phan yon dang /
NK003(ga)010:443: gsal rgyal gyi tshigs bcad gnyis ka'am mi nus na res mos su bklag /
NK003(ga)010:444: de nas skabs 'dir bzang spyod smon lam 'don par
NK003(ga)010:445: gsungs kyang cho ga tshar grangs mang po'i skabs sats+tsha
NK003(ga)010:446: rnams blangs bzhag gi khyad kyis rjes nas 'don na
NK003(ga)010:448: 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la sogs nas /
NK003(ga)010:451: gzhung ltar bzod gsol dang gshegs gsol bya /
NK003(ga)010:452: rten la dmigs nas brtan bzhugs byas kyang rung /
NK003(ga)010:453: de nas gong du ma 'don na bzang spyod 'dir 'don cing /
NK003(ga)010:454: phun sum tshogs pa sogs zhal nas gsungs pa'i bkra
NK003(ga)010:455: shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas thog drangs shis brjod
NK003(ga)010:456: bya / tshar grangs mang po'i skabs de'i tshe las
NK003(ga)010:457: rdor sogs kyis s+aats+tsha rnams gzhan du spyan drangs la
NK003(ga)010:458: bya / / rjes ma rnams dkyil 'khor du bsgrigs pa dang /
NK003(ga)010:459: mchod gtor gsar du bsham pa dang kha gso ba sogs bya'o //
NK003(ga)010:460: gnyis pa cho ga 'bring bo tsam byed na /
NK003(ga)010:461: spyi'i lag len sogs rgyas pa ltar la /
NK003(ga)010:462: thog mar tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa lta bu'i tshigs brjod nas 'phags pa rnams la phyag bya /
NK003(ga)010:463: gang gis rten cing sogs stong pa nyid bsgom pa nas brtsams chog gzhung ltar btang ba las /
NK003(ga)010:464: spyan 'dren snga phyi'i bar du mchod 'bul ltar /
NK003(ga)010:465: de bzhin gshegs pa dang sogs kyis mchod rten spyan 'dren sbyar /
NK003(ga)010:466: chog gzhung gi phyag mchod dang /
NK003(ga)010:467: gleng bzhi brjod cing thugs dam bskul ba /
NK003(ga)010:468: bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ba rnams grub pa'i rjes su /
NK003(ga)010:472: bskor ba'i phan yon gyi tshigs bcad /
NK003(ga)010:474: bzod gsol sogs kyang rgyas pa dang 'dra la /
NK003(ga)010:475: mdor na mchod 'bum las mchod rten spyan 'dren sbyor
NK003(ga)010:476: ba tsam ma gtogs gzhan chog gzhung kho na tshang
NK003(ga)010:478: gsum pa cho ga bsdus pa ni /
NK003(ga)010:479: chog gzhung la snying por phyung na'ang phyogs tsam rung mod /
NK003(ga)010:481: 'bring bsdus 'di dag la cho ga'i cha lag tshang dka' ba dang /
NK003(ga)010:482: 'phri bsnan bsab 'os mang na lag len du khyer
NK003(ga)010:483: mi bde bas bsdus pa'i cho ga dri med lam
NK003(ga)010:484: 'jug ces bya ba nag 'gros zur du bkod pa
NK003(ga)010:486: de'ang cho ga tshar grangs mang du bya dgos pa'i
NK003(ga)010:487: tshe snga dro thog mar rgyas pa tshar gcig btang
NK003(ga)010:489: de nas bsdus pa du thon bya ba'am /
NK003(ga)010:490: rgyas pa'i khongs su 'bring po'ang 'du bas zur du
NK003(ga)010:491: mi bya bar rgyas pa tshar gcig gi rjes su
NK003(ga)010:492: bsdus pa nyid gang 'grub byas na bde zhing legs
NK003(ga)010:493: pa mngon no // bzhi pa rjes ni /
NK003(ga)010:494: s+aats+tsha brgya stong lta bu nyung ngu las mi 'grub
NK003(ga)010:495: na de dag gi cho ga zin nas tsha khang
NK003(ga)010:496: lta bu phyag bskor sogs bkur sti dang tshogs bsags
NK003(ga)010:497: kyi rten du 'gyur la chud mi za ba'i gnas
NK003(ga)010:498: su dbu zhabs ma logs par bzhugs su gsol bas
NK003(ga)010:499: 'thus shing / 'bum ther lta bu la lam gyi gzhi mado'am gong smos kyi gnas sogs su /
NK003(ga)010:500: sa chog sngon du 'gro bas khang bu brtsegs pa'i
NK003(ga)010:501: mchod rten brtsigs pa'i nang du dbus su rdo la
NK003(ga)010:502: brkos pa'i dkyil 'khor sogs 'du byas te /
NK003(ga)010:503: dri med rnam gnyis kyi cho ga'i gzhung ji lta bar srog shing 'dzugs pa'i cho ga byas la /
NK003(ga)010:504: gtsug tor dri med kyi mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)010:505: 'od zer dri med kyi mchod rten dgu bcu rtsa
NK003(ga)010:506: dgu rnams dbus su bang sgrom lta bur bzhugs pa'i
NK003(ga)010:507: mtha' bskor du s+aats+tsha byings rnams kyang dbu zhabs ma
NK003(ga)010:508: log par bzhugs su gsol na phan yon bsam las
NK003(ga)010:509: 'das pa gzhung de dag tu gsal ba ltar ro
NK003(ga)010:510: // gal te 'od zer dri med kyi s+aats+tsha'i cho
NK003(ga)010:511: ga byed na'ang gzhung 'di dag la smon lam sogs
NK003(ga)010:512: cung zad kha bsgyur bas 'grub ste de'i tshul ni
NK003(ga)010:513: lo chen d+har+m+aa sh+r+ai'i yig cha sogs su shes par
NK003(ga)010:514: // bya'o // cho ga lan gcig grub kyang ngan 'gro yi //
NK003(ga)010:515: skye sgo gcod cing byang chub tshogs rdzogs pa'i //
NK003(ga)010:516: thabs mchog sangs rgyas zhal nas ched basngagasa pa //
NK003(ga)010:517: dang du len pa'i skal can deng sang dkon //
NK003(ga)010:518: 'on kyang snying nas yid ches dad pa yis //
NK003(ga)010:519: bris 'dis ring bsrel snying po can gyi gdung //
NK003(ga)010:520: rnam dag cho ga'i gzi ldan sa gsum khyab //
NK003(ga)010:521: bzang po spyod pa'i rnam thar yongs rdzogs shog /
NK003(ga)010:522: dri med cho ga'i lag len 'di nyid skyabs mgon
NK003(ga)010:523: rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa bcu bzhi pas bka'
NK003(ga)010:524: stsal me tog spyi bor bcings shing /
NK003(ga)010:525: snga phyir don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gi bzhed pa skong ba'i phyir dang /
NK003(ga)010:526: chos tshul khyad par 'phags pa 'di nyid dar zhing
NK003(ga)010:527: rgyas par gyur na ci ma rung snyam du lhag
NK003(ga)010:528: pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te /
NK003(ga)010:529: yon tan rgya mtsho'i ming can blo gros mtha' yas
NK003(ga)010:530: pa'i sdes rdzong gsar bkra shis lha rtse'i chos grwar
